hadiths.text: Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:Whosoever grafts the tree and then sells its roots, its fruit will belong to one who grafts it except when provision is laid down by the buyer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَاعَ نَخْلاً عَلَيْهَا ثَمَرٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who sells date palms on which there are dates
